A quadrilateral is inscribed in a circle. If an angle is inscribed into each of the four segments outside the quadrilateral, the sum of these four angles, expressed in degrees, is:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 1080\qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ 900\qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 720\qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ 540\qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ 360$
